fists.name: Bare Fists
fists.description: Your fists. Sometimes, the easiest solution just works. You might still want to look out for something better.

attack1.name: Quick Jab
attack1.description: Throw a light jab at your opponent. Not terribly effective, but quick and accurate.

text.on_hit: The jab lands and hits {def.object} in the chest.
text.on_kill: Through a miracle, the jab pierces {def.owns} ribcage and {def.poss_adjective} heart!
text.on_dodge: {def.name} twist{def.s} to the side, causing the jab to miss.
text.on_armor_save: The jab lands, but {def.owns} armor is to thick for it to do any harm.

attack2.name: Heavy Uppercut
attack2.description: This punch packs a serious punch! However, you have to be close to your opponent, which makes it hard to hit.

text.wind_up: {atk.name} attempt{atk.s} to hit {def.name} with a salted uppercut!
text.on_hit: {atk.owns} punch connects to {def.owns} chin, leaving {def.poss_adjective} ears ringing!
text.on_kill: {def.owns} neck snaps under the force of the uppercut!
text.on_dodge: {def.name} bend{def.s} backwards, and the uppercut misses.

default_dagger.name: Dusty Dagger
default_dagger.description: A double-edged knife with a pointed tip made to pierce armor. A rogues first weapon. Even though it has seen better days, it is still lethal in the right hands.

attack1.name: Rapid Slash
attack1.description: Slash at your opponent. Will do good against weaker, unarmored targets.

text.on_hit: The attack grazes {def.name}, flinging a trail of {def.poss_adjective} {def.blood} through the air!
text.on_kill: The attack slashes a deep, fatal wound into {def.name}!
text.on_dodge: The attack misses by a hairs breadth!

attack2.name: Stab the Weak Spot
attack2.description: Try to find a vulnerability in the opponents posture or armor, and stab right into it. Finicky to land, but deals good damage.

text.wind_up: {atk.name} scan{atk.s} {def.name} for a possibility to pierce a weak spot!
text.on_hit: {atk.name} find{atk.s} a way with {atk.poss_adjective} blade into {def.name}, hitting {def.object} where it really hurts!
text.on_kill: {atk.name} nimbly find{atk.s} a way to pierce one of {def.owns} vital organs!
text.on_dodge: {def.name} see{def.s} {atk.owns} attack coming, and dodge{atk.s} the attack.
text.on_armor_save: {atk.name} cannot find a good vantage point through {def.owns} armor!

default_mace.name: Rusty Mace
default_mace.description: A heavy iron ball attached to an equally iron handle wrapped in leather. The iron parts have already begun to rust, but it is still not to be trifled with.  It is very top-heavy, and therefore a little unwieldy.

attack1.name: Smash
attack1.description: A simple strike at your opponent - perfect if simple is all you need. As maces tend to be, it is good at transferring damage through armor.

text.on_kill: {atk.name} crushes one of {def.owns} vital organs with {atk.poss_adjective} brutal strike!
text.on_dodge: {def.name} move{def.s} aside, causing the strike to miss.

attack2.name: Another Smash
attack2.description: There is only so much you can do with this mace...

text.on_kill: {atk.name} crushes one of {def.owns} vital organs with {atk.poss_adjective} brutal strike!
text.on_dodge: {def.name} move{def.s} aside, causing the strike to miss.

default_pyro_tome.name: Pyromancy for Dummies
default_pyro_tome.description: A piece of almost crude literature detailing the most basic two pyromancy spells.

attack1.name: Singeing Burst
attack1.description: Ignite the air in front of you. Extremely efficient at hitting your opponent, not so much at actually hurting them.

text.wind_up: {atk.name} start{atk.s} chanting a spell from {atk.poss_adjective} spell book!
text.on_hit: The air in front of {atk.name} ignites, catching {def.name} inside and burning {def.poss_adjective} superficially.
text.on_kill: The air in front of {atk.name} ignites, catching {def.name} inside and burning {def.poss_adjective} to a crisp!.
text.on_dodge: {def.name} leaps out of the way of the ensuing combustion!

attack2.name: Fireball
attack2.description: Form a sphere of fire and hurl it at your opponent. A lot more condensed and potent than the burst.

text.wind_up: {atk.name} start{atk.s} chanting a spell from {atk.poss_adjective} spell book!
text.on_hit: {def.name} receive{def.s} {atk.owns} fireball straight to the face!
text.on_kill: {def.name} gets charred to a crisp by {atk.owns} fireball!
